item.title: Flare-On 2022 - à la mode
item.description: Challenge Description FLARE FACT #824: Disregard flare fact #823 if you are a .NET Reverser too. We will now reward your fantastic effort with a small binary challenge. You’ve earned it kid! Basic Static Analysis We are given what appears to be a .Net Dll and a chat log file * HowDoesThisWork.dll: PE32 executable (DLL) (GUI) Intel 80386 Mono/.Net assembly, for MS Windows IR chat log.txt: ASCII text, with CRLF line terminators The Dll seems to be missing the executable that is supposed to interact with it according to the text file.
